title: The Zombie's Lust
description: Jessica is a college student who just wants to celebrate New Year's Eve with her boyfriend, even if he can't satisfy her deepest desires. But when a zombie apocalypse wreaks havoc on their party — and the world — Jess finds herself alone with one of the monstrous beasts. Jess soon learns that there's one thing that zombies crave more than flesh — and it's up to her to satisfy their lustful appetites.This is a story about monster sex. It is not suitable for anyone under 18 years of age. It is graphic and unlike anything you've read before. All of the sexual content found in this book is explicit.
author: Serena Lawrence
